88887.「……タッツィ ディエゴ サリアス。\n 大切な話を しますから\n ３人とも:
Tazzi, Diego, and Sarias. I have something
very important to discuss with you.

88888.「未熟だった あなたたちも\n <cs_pchero>さんのおかげで\n ひと回:
Thanks to <cs_pchero>, you who were
inexperienced have grown up.

88889.「私は これから\n <cs_pchero>さんの 最終試練のために\n 案内役:
I am about to guide <cs_pchero> through his
final trial.

88890.「……さあ あなたたちも 一緒に来なさい。\n そこで <cs_pchero>さ:
...Now come along with us, my friends. There
you will witness the trials of <cs_pchero>
and learn the essence of their strength.

88891.「さて お待たせしました。\n さっそく 試練の場へ 向かいましょう！:
Well, here you go. Let's head straight for the
trials!

88892.「……それにしても 感慨深いですね。\n はじめて あなたを お見かけした時は\:
I am deeply moved by that. When I saw you for
the first time, I had no idea that you could
reach this level.

88893.「今回は あなたの実力に 敬意を表し\n 少しばかり 本気を出させていただきます:
This time, out of respect for your abilities,
I'm going to show a little more seriousness.
Please do not let your guard down.

88894.「深淵に潜みし 異界の魔物よ…… \n 我が召喚に応え 今 ここに来たれ！:
Monsters of the other world, lurking in the
depths, answer my summons and come here now!

88895.「おや……おどろかれましたか？\n この子は いざという時のために \n 用意し:
Well...were you surprised? This child is my
treasured possession that I have prepared for
an emergency.

88896.「それでは……最終試練 はじめっ！: Now... the final trial. Let's begin!

88897.「……前の戦いでは 私の秘蔵っ子の外見に\n 油断されたようですね……。\n 今:
...In the previous battle you were caught off
guard by my secret appearance...this time show
me what you are made of.

88898.「深淵に潜みし 異界の魔物よ…… \n 我が召喚に応え 今 ここに来たれ！:
Monsters of the other world, lurking in the
depths, answer my summons and come here now!

88899.「それでは……最終試練 はじめっ！: Now... the final trial. Let's begin!

88900.「なんということでしょう……。\n 私の秘蔵っ子さえも やすやすと倒すとは\n:
How dare you... I must have misjudged your
ability to easily defeat even my treasured
son.

88901.「これほど たやすく乗り越えられては\n とても 最終試練とは 言えません。:
It would hardly be a final trial if it were so
easy to overcome.

88902.「……ですが こういった事態を予測して\n 今回の試練には 続きを ご用意してい:
However, in anticipation of such an
eventuality, we have prepared a continuation
for this trial.

88903.「さあ……タッツィ ディエゴ サリアス。\n これは あなたたちにとっても修行の:
Come on...Tazzi Diego Sarias. This is part of
your training. Give it everything you've got.

88906.「今回は 正々堂々\n 戦わせていただきます！: This time we will fight fair and square!

88907.「さあ <cs_pchero>さん。\n 私たち 全員がお相手いたします！\n:
Come on <cs_pchero>. We are all here to help
you! Please defeat all the monsters.

88909.「もう これ以上 私から あなたに\n 与えるべき試練は ありません。\n これ:
There are no more trials for me to put you
through. This lesson is now over.

88910.「……それに引きかえ あなたたちの\n 戦いぶりは いったい なんですか。:
But what is it about you people that makes you
fight so hard?

88911.「こんな結果では 当分 卒業は認められません。\n 罰として 追加の修練を課しま:
With results like these, you won't be allowed
to graduate for a while. Keep in mind that
added trials will be imposed as punishment.

88915.「……あなたには 話しておきましょう。\n じつは 彼ら３人の真の姿は\n 戦い:
I have a story to tell you. In fact, the true
form of these three persons is that of spirits
of the olden times who preside over battles.

88916.「旧い友人の頼みで そのチカラをきたえるべく\n あえて 人の姿に身を変えさせて:
At the request of an old friend, I have been
training for a long, long time in the form of
a person in order to strengthen my power.

88917.「……あなたの この最終試練は\n 彼らの修練としても きっと役立つものと思い\:
I thought that this final trial of yours would
be useful for their training as well, so I
decided to allow you to witness it.

88918.「彼らのことは いつか訪れる\n 大いなる闇の根源との 対決にそなえて\n 今後:
I will continue to nurture them in preparation
for the confrontation with the great source of
darkness that will one day come.

88919.「時が来れば あなたとも 手を取り合い\n 共に 戦うことが あるかもしれません:
When the time comes, we may fight hand in
hand. I look forward to working with you in
that case.

88920.「……さて。お約束した通り 試練に打ち勝った\n あなたの スキルポイントの割り:
Well...now. As promised, I'm going to release
your skill point allotment limit to 150 for
overcoming the trial.

88921.「上限の解放は ダーマ神殿で おこないます。\n さあ みんなも 帰りますよ。:
The release of the upper limit will take place
at Alltrades Abbey. Come on, everyone, let's
go home.
